name: Bolo Ball (1996)
description: Play against the computer in this strategy marble maze game. Your objective is to get your marbles to the bottom of a maze filled with ramps, walls, black holes and much more! Block your opponent by pushing your marbles into strategic positions to stop him from doing the same to you. In Boloball, there are no clocks, no monsters to shoot, or luck involved, just a pure ADDICTIVE strategy game!
